neural_network package¶

Submodules¶

neural_network.Main module¶

The Main module runs the Recurrent Neural Network using Long Short-Term Memory architecture.

neural_network.RNN_LSTM module¶

The RNN_LSTM module implements a recurrent neural network using LSTM.

neural_network.RNN_LSTM.build_model()¶

Build the learning RNN model using Keras (Sequential) module.

Returns:RNN model
Return type:History object
neural_network.RNN_LSTM.run_rnn(file)¶

Run the process to train/test a recurrent neural network using LSTM using a given dataset file.

Parameters:file (string) – Location of CSV-formatted dataset file
Returns:Model with expected (test) targets and associated scores
Return type:object, dataframe, object
neural_network.RNN_LSTM.split_test_training(data_path, sequence_length)¶

Split data between test and training examples.

Parameters:
  • data_path (string) – Location of CSV-formatted data
  • sequence_length (int) – Sequence length (temporal window) to be used
Returns:

Training examples (X_train), training targets (y_train), test examples (X_test) and test targets (y_test)
Return type:

dataframe, dataframe, dataframe, dataframe
